detection: notification made by an elementary school
prevention: wholesome water access to all elementary schools by concerned authorities
especially during the likely seasons of water source contamination
as well as health education promotion about foodborne outbreaks to all school stakeholders
investigation: the cucumber tofu that was supplied in the meals was found to be associated with the food poisoning
title: A Diarrhoeagenic Enteropathogenic Escherichia Coli (Epec) Infection Outbreak That Occurred Among Elementary School Children
